ComicInfo.Summary:
Mad Love: Doctor Frankenbeans creates Madbelle, a female Madball, which he hopes will help him destroy the other Madballs.
Maiden Hong Kong Blues: The Madballs battle Maiden Hong Kong and her henchmen, who are trying to force Mr. Kao into putting bad fortunes into his restaurant's fortune cookies.
ComicInfo.Tags: Splitting Headache,Slobulus,Madballs,Foul Shot,Dr. Frankenbeans,Horn Head,Oculus Orbus,Bash Brain,Fist Face,Dust Brain,Snivelitch,Swine Sucker,Bruise Brother,Screamin' Meemie
ComicInfo.Title: Mad Love; Maiden Hong Kong Blues
